update t_activity
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_begin = #{activityBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activity_end = #{activityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activity_address = #{activityAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_describe = #{activityDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actor_num = #{actorNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
